resetPassword.invalidLinkDescription: This password reset link is invalid or has already been used.
resetPassword.validatingTokenDescription: Please wait while we validate your password reset token...
resetPassword.tokenValidatedDescription: You can now set your new password.
resetPassword.invalidSession: Invalid session. Please request a new reset link.
